thread.title: Lydia Ko takes 4-shot lead in LPGA Taiwan Championship
thread.title_full: Lydia Ko takes 4-shot lead in LPGA Taiwan Championship

title: Lydia Ko takes 4-shot lead in LPGA Taiwan Championship
text: Lydia Ko takes 4-shot lead in LPGA Taiwan Championship Saturday, 24 October 2015 (32 seconds ago) TAIPEI, Taiwan (AP) Lydia Ko took a four-stroke lead Saturday in the LPGA Taiwan Championship, putting the 18-year-old New Zealander in position to regain the top spot in the world ranking.
